data.eml:eml: Description of two new species of Hetereleotris (Gobiidae) from the south Pacific, with a revised key to species and synonymization of the genus Pascua with Hetereleotris.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Douglass F. Hoese, Helen K. Larson (2005): Description of two new species of Hetereleotris (Gobiidae) from the south Pacific, with a revised key to species and synonymization of the genus Pascua with Hetereleotris. Zootaxa 1096: 1-16, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:5090B868-375F-42B9-A4E4-ED7739E68786
